channel.title: Blogs on Kash Cummings
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Kash Cummings

item.author: me@kash.money (Kash Cummings)
item.description: Notes as of April ‘24 Activities Lots of hiking of all kinds of skill levels. Anywhere along the Hudson River is easy, I’ve done 3 or 4 routes. Good views, nice trees and greenery. Plenty of lists on AllHikes like Upstate NYC Hikes or Best Hikes Drinking. So many breweries and distilleries and wineries up state. Zooming in on those maps and re-searching will yield more Storm King Art Center - giant sculpture park with bike rentals.
